name: Zampanini
description:
http://eyedolgames.com/Zampanini/   It's probably better to play here. This is my attempt to rot proof it (though interestingly if eyedolgames or farrago dies, so too will the IMAGES in this (though hopefully not the rest). 

This is not a food delivery service. Browser the various Not!Restaurants to find the Not!Food of your dreams. Be sure to tip. Watch out for hidden fees. 

WARNING: the downloadable version is JUST Zampanini, not any of the next forks of the branch.  You can checkout, but you can never leave.
